name: Ascend clouds
description:
ONLY PLAYABLE WITH CONTROLLER

Ascend Clouds is a boss fight project I've made with 2 other programmers and 5 artists. For this project, we had some constraints:

- Use Unity

- Playable with controller

- Make a 3 to 10 minute long boss fight

Programmers:
Hansotte Joachim (programmer)
Benjamin Lefevre (programmer)
Rodrigue Maurouard (programmer)

Artists:
Thevenard Quentin (Environnement)
Augustin Grassien (Fx)
Lucas Stinson (Ambiance)
Theophile Loaec (Animations)
Simon Romain ( Character Modelling)

Enjoy ;)
